Our culture of innovation enables us to tackle 
complex technical and sustainability challenges 
and operate at the nexus of the next frontier. With 
one foot in the future, we strive to enable what’s next, 
while living up to our responsibilities today.
KLA is a place where curiosity is celebrated, thinking 
big is recognized, and driving progress is expected. We 
know that our greatest opportunity to have a positive 
impact on our world is by turning theories into reality. 
And through our responsible supply chain stewardship, 
we help to move sustainable innovation forward 
through collaboration.
